title: Surface - Your Photo Watchface
summary: Use your photos on phone, Instagram or Facebook as your watch face
description: Took lots of photos but never look at them again?Use Surface as your watch face to show all photos on your phone as watch face.You can also use photos from Instagram as watch face, too. Either from those photos that you took, or your news feed![NEW] Facebook is now added as another choice of sourcePhotos will be processed (blur and darken) so that you will able to see time clearly
descriptionHTML:
Took lots of photos but never look at them again?
Use Surface as your watch face to show all photos on your phone as watch face.
You can also use photos from Instagram as watch face, too. Either from those photos that you took, or your news feed!
[NEW] Facebook is now added as another choice of source

Photos will be processed (blur and darken) so that you will able to see time clearly
comments: Exactly what I was looking for Would like to see an option to always use the latest photo instead of random.
Dope Great for your own photos on your Android wear watch
Simple and effective Works well and easy to set up
